definition: to shake out/to bring to light/to squander
to tremble/to shake out/to reveal/to make it in the world
to draw towards oneself/to gather/to gather up (one's gown, sleeves etc)/to grab (money)/to extort
to hug/to embrace/to hold in one's arms

sentences.english: Let the old house in the front, the day blind Doulou you doing?
sentences.chinese: 老在咱們家的跟前，整天的瞎抖摟，你幹嗎？

sentences.english: Let everyone know all the wicked things she has done.
sentences.chinese: 他把那些人做的壞事都給抖摟出來了。
